about_the_game:
In the cruel and dangerous world of carnivorous plants, on the ruins of human civilization, our heroine is born. A child of trees and primitive genetic engineering. She will have to fight for her life, unravel the mysteries of the past and try to become something more than just a fruit of the human tree.

PLAY A DARK AND HORRIFYING ADVENTURE

You are in a world of plants, where everything is trying to kill and eat you, you're just a food. Hide, survive and move. Try to find your sister, escape, find out whats happening and discover other plans of the plants.

UNRAVEL WHY HUMANITY DISAPPEARED

Look carrefully when you are in world of plants, everything around you tell you the story of the humanity. Discrover it. Good Luck.

FEATURES

  • Discover unknown post apocaliptic world where plants mutate and capture the world
  • Solve unique puzzles and find way out
  • Find alternitive way to solve puzzles and change the future of the Third
  • Unique story
  • Companion
  • Enemies
  • Unique Style
